arts.ttl: Zsolt Löw: “I'm proud of the team”
arts.sum: Zsolt Löw praises RB Leipzig after a winning start in his Bundesliga debut.

arts.ttl: Leipzig down Hoffenheim in Lőw’s Bundesliga debut
arts.sum: Leipzig’s Champions League hopes are back on track after a 3-1 win in Zsolt Lőw’s Bundesliga debut.

arts.ttl: Man United 'not alone in their admiration' of £59.5m-rated RB Leipzig star as Premier League rivals are 'revealed'
arts.sum: Manchester United will allegedly face competition from Premier League rivals Arsenal, Chelsea and Liverpool for RB Leipzig attacker Xavi Simons.

arts.ttl: Zsolt Lőw's Leipzig triumph against ten-man Hoffenheim to boost European hopes
arts.sum: RB Leipzig defeated Hoffenheim in Zsolt Lőw's first Bundesliga match in charge, with Benjamin Šeško, Ridle Baku and Yussuf Poulsen on the scoresheet as the hosts moved within a point of fourth-placed Mainz. The Red Bull Arena witnessed a thrilling encounter as Leipzig hosted Hoffenheim in the Bundesliga coaching debut of Lőw, who found himself facing the club whom he spent two years with as a player - with both teams eager to secure crucial points.

arts.ttl: RB Leipzig vs. TSG Hoffenheim preview: Momentous occasion for Löw and Leipzig
arts.sum: Zsolt Löw’s first-ever league game as a head coach will be Leipzig’s 300th in Bundesliga.

arts.ttl: Matthias Jaissle the next name linked to the RB Leipzig job
arts.sum: Bild reports that former Red Bull Salzburg head coach Matthias Jaissle is the next name to be linked to the vacant RB Leipzig job. The German is currently managing Al Ahli…
A number of coaches are being considered for the job as RB Leipzig coach following the sacking of Marco Rose.

arts.ttl: Preview: RB Leipzig vs. Hoffenheim - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Bundesliga clash between RB Leipzig and Hoffenheim, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.

arts.ttl: Ilaix Moriba could get a second chance at Leipzig, Kicker reports
arts.sum: The Guinean international fell out of favour early in his Leipzig career, but a recent turn of events might enable a comeback.
